alert.note: Alert for Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 03 at 8:45PM CST until February 05 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County. For the Pascagoula...including Collins, Near Hattiesburg, Hattiesburg, Laurel, Chunky, Arundel, Enterprise, Shubuta, Brooklyn...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallahala Creek At Laurel. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Agricultural and lowland flooding is becoming more widespread along and near the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Friday the stage was 13.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tallahala Creek Laurel 13.0 13.5 Fri 7 pm CST 12.6 11.3 11.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 845 AM CST.
